code:
def max_subarray(nums, k):
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    window_sum = 0
    start = 0
    
    for end in range(len(nums)):
        window_sum += nums[end]
        
        if end >= k-1:
            max_sum = max(max_sum, window_sum)
            window_sum -= nums[start]
            start += 1
    
    return max_sum
